name: Miel
description:
"What if I tell you that one of the most important jobs in the world is also one of the most dangerous. Pollution has taken nature and it is giving troubles to the most valued creature on earth. Flowers are not the same that used to be and now what used to Being a simple job is a fight for survival. Take the place of a little bee in a corrupted nature. And fight against corrupted flowers your goal is pollination in a great adventure to avoid extinction." ―Petitmori

Miel is a Defender-style 2D shooter made for the A Game By Its Cover 2021 gamejam, based on petitmori's Famicase entry of the same name. In Miel, you take the role of a bee girl fighting errant pollutants and the corrupted flowers that spawn them; each flower destroyed makes way for a new and healthy flower, which you can collect pollen from and deliver to your hive.

As with any gamejam game, this is a small subset of the game's plans that I could fit into the time I had. AGBIC gives plenty of time, but I had a late start while recovering from surgery, so my free time and energy were especially limited. Nonetheless, I hope it's entertaining, and I hope to bring more of it to you with time!

Controls:

  • Arrow keys, directional pad: Move
  • Z, Space, A Button: Fire
  • Enter, Start Button: Pause
